titleStmt.title: To the alderman, deputy and common-councel-men of the ward of [blank]
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Orders by the commissioners under the Act for the speedy provision of money for disbanding and paying of the forces, to the aldermen and common-council-men of the different wards, for the better execution of the Act.
Dated at end: Dated at the Guild-hall London the 4 day of September, 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
